title: Successful login for all roles
description: Verify that users from all defined roles (Admin, Teacher, Parent, Student, Accountant, Librarian, Manager) can authenticate successfully using valid credentials and are directed to their respective dashboards.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid credentials for each role one by one
Submit the login form
Verify that each user is redirected to the correct role-specific dashboard

title: Handle invalid login attempts gracefully
description: Verify that authentication fails properly when invalid or empty credentials are submitted and appropriate error messages are displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid credentials
Submit the login form
Verify error message indicating invalid login credentials is shown
Attempt login with empty username and/or password
Verify error messages for required fields are displayed

title: Role-based dashboard content verification
description: Ensure each user role sees the correct dashboard content, features, and widgets tailored only to their role without data leakage.

steps.description: Login as Admin and verify dashboard components
Verify admin features such as user management, finance overview, operations controls are present
Login as Teacher and verify dashboard components
Verify academic management tools like classes, attendance, assignments are visible
Login as Parent and verify dashboard components
Verify child progress, communications, and payments sections are accessible
Login as Student, Accountant, Librarian, and Manager and verify their respective dashboards for correct elements

title: Create, update, and delete Halaqa sessions
description: Verify Teachers can create, modify, and delete classes (Halaqa sessions) and that changes reflect in the system correctly.

steps.description: Login as Teacher and navigate to Halaqa management
Create a new Halaqa session with valid data
Confirm new session appears in the list
Edit the created Halaqa session details
Verify updated information is saved and shown correctly
Delete the previously created Halaqa session
Confirm the session is removed from the list

title: Assignment lifecycle management
description: Validate that Teachers can create, update, and delete assignments and students can view and submit them appropriately.

steps.description: Teacher logs in and navigates to assignments module
Create a new assignment with proper title, description, and due date
Assignment is listed and visible to assigned students
Teacher updates assignment details
Updated assignment data is reflected for students
Teacher deletes an assignment
Assignment is no longer visible to students
Student logs in and views assignments
Student can view assignment details and submission status

title: Attendance tracking accuracy
description: Verify Teachers can record attendance for classes properly and that attendance data is stored and visible for reports and dashboards.

steps.description: Teacher navigates to attendance module for a given Halaqa
Mark present and absent students for a session
Attendance is saved and accessible in the system
Modify attendance and save changes
Updates reflect correctly in attendance records
Verify attendance data visible in performance analytics for teachers and parents

title: Student progress tracking and digital logbook accuracy
description: Ensure progress analytics and digital logbooks reflect accurate student data entered by teachers and are accessible by appropriate roles.

steps.description: Teacher inputs progress data for students
Data is saved and shown in student progress trackers
Parent views child's progress on dashboard
Progress analytics and logbooks display correct data
Student views own progress data
Student progress data corresponds with teacher entries

title: Financial transaction processing and billing management
description: Validate billing creation, payment processing, and expense recording function correctly, with accurate financial reports and analytics available to Accountants and Admins.

steps.description: Accountant creates billing records for students/parents
Billing appears correctly in system and on user portals
Make a payment towards a billing item
Payment is recorded, balance updated accurately
Record staff salaries and expenses
Finance reports correctly reflect recorded salaries and expenses
Verify financial analytics dashboard displays accurate charts and summaries

title: Real-time messaging delivery and notification handling
description: Verify that real-time messages between users are delivered instantly and notifications trigger appropriately for new messages or alerts.

steps.description: User A sends a message to User B
User B receives the message instantly
Generate a notification for a new message or event
Notification appears immediately on recipient's device
Send multiple simultaneous messages to stress test messaging system
All messages are delivered without loss or duplication

title: Transport management workflow
description: Test management of transport routes, driver assignments, and vehicle status updating by coordinators and verify real-time status tracking.

steps.description: Transport coordinator creates a new route with stops
Route details are saved and visible in the system
Assign drivers to routes
Driver assignments are recorded and shown
Update vehicle status during route operation
Real-time vehicle status is updated and reflected to stakeholders

title: Library system inventory and loan management
description: Verify that librarians can manage book inventory, issue and return loans properly, and usage statistics are accurate.

steps.description: Librarian adds new books to inventory
Books appear in catalog with correct details
Issue a book loan to a student or parent
Loan record is created and book status updated
Return a loaned book
Book availability status returns to 'available' and loan is closed
View library usage statistics dashboard
Statistics reflect accurate loan counts and inventory status

title: Gamification points and leaderboard update
description: Confirm that student gamification points, badges, streaks are recorded properly and leaderboard reflects real-time ranking.

steps.description: Students complete tasks to earn points and badges
Points and badges are updated immediately in user profile
Access the leaderboard page
Leaderboard shows accurate, up-to-date rankings and streak information

title: Multi-language support with RTL validation
description: Ensure the UI supports Arabic, English, and Somali languages with proper Right-To-Left layout where applicable and fully responsive design across devices.

steps.description: Switch application language to Arabic
Verify all UI elements align properly with RTL reading order
Switch application language to Somali
Verify UI is correctly displayed in LTR format with translated text
Switch language to English and verify layout
Validate full responsiveness on desktop, tablet, and mobile screens in all languages

title: Security validation for role-based data access
description: Verify users cannot access features or data outside their assigned roles to prevent data leakage and maintain confidentiality.

steps.description: Login as Teacher and attempt to access Admin-only pages or data
Access is denied with appropriate error or redirection
Login as Parent and verify inability to access Accountant or Librarian dashboards
Access restriction is enforced
Attempt unauthorized REST or backend API access using different role tokens
API denies unauthorized data retrieval or manipulation
